text: Did something happen to dark theme?
I opened up DM and I’m assuming that dark theme wasn’t on because I feel like I’ve been flashbanged
Can you recommend a good sunscreen?
it appears the class used to activate the dark theme is not sticking
as a temporary fix if you want to trigger the dark theme while the extension is being figured out you can inspect the design manager and add `ext-dark-theme` to the body element

Beta Users the update is hitting you first — just pushed it. not sure when I can get to fixing this for stable yet.

Problem was caused by HubSpot finally changing the URL of the Design manager to no longer be beta

Stable build users who have dark theme enabled a temporary workaround is to add `ext-dark-theme` to the body element of your design manager.

Update pushed for stable and beta builds. Stable - enjoy the new tips in the popup.

Beta build - 1 new tip, (what’d you expect I updated beta this morning lol cut me some slack, can’t always be christmas every update)
